text: Bristol Palin has returned to Texas after spending some time quality time with her family in her home state of Alaska amid reports her husband Dakota Meyer has filed for divorce. The 27 - year - old mother - of - three, who has two daughters with Dakota, took to Instagram on Wednesday to post a snapshot of herself enjoying the Alaskan winter with her two - year - old Sailor Grace.'Already missing AK,'she captioned the image, which shows her eldest daughter bundled up in a bright pink snow suit while cuddled in her arms.
